Here is the Marathon time data:

```{r}
library(resampledata)
head(ChiMarathonMen)
```

```{r}
mysample <- sample(ChiMarathonMen$FinishMin, size=6, replace=F)
mean(mysample)
```

```{r}
N=10^4
Xbar <- numeric(N)
for (i in 1:N)
{mysample <- sample(ChiMarathonMen$FinishMin, size=6, replace=F)
Xbar[i] <- mean(mysample)}

hist(Xbar)
```
$$P(X \leq 11)=\int_0^{11} f(t) dt$$

```{r}
mean(Xbar<150)
```
